issue.title: [Java] Support range value comparison for large varchar/varbinary vectors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8972](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8972). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support comparing a range of values for LargeVarCharVector and LargeVarBinaryVector.
